import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { showLogin } from '../../redux/account' import '../../cssHelper/helper.css' function Sign() { const [userData, setuserData] = useState([ { email: '', password: '' } ]) const dispatch = useDispatch(); const addUserData = (e) => { setuserData({ ...userData, [e.target.email]:e.target.value, [e.target.password]:e.target.value }) } console.log(userData); return (
